title: Säkerhetsanalytiker sökes till Nordlo SOC team i Stockholm
description:
Brinner du för IT-säkerhet och har ett stort intresse för cyberattacker, en hög känsla för service och har erfarenhet av SIEM-system, Antivirus/EDR-skydd och Threat hunting? Trivs du dessutom med att arbeta kvällar, helger och nätter? Då kan rollen som säkerhetsanalytiker i Nordlos SOC team vara för dig!
   

  

 Vi är nu på jakt efter dig som vill vara med på vår resa och utveckla vårt cyberförsvar i en roll som innebär att du är analyserar och kategoriserar säkerhetsincidenter och driver detta tillsammans med våra seniora säkerhetsspecialister.
   

  

**Vad kan du förvänta dig av rollen?**
 IT-säkerhet är en högaktuell fråga för alla företag, så även våra kunder. Därför utvecklar vi på Nordlo nu ett nytt SOC team för att kunna leverera säkra IT-tjänster till våra kunder och för rätt person kan det även finnas möjligheter till stor påverkan på utformningen av det här nya teamet hos oss på Nordlo.
   

  

 I den här rollen kommer du dels att arbeta med ärendehantering inom diverse olika system och IT-miljöer. Du kommer parallellt arbeta självständigt med larmövervakning och att analysera incidenter, vilket ställer krav på att du har fokus på lösningen och är kreativ i din felsökning. Vissa incidenter kan även kräva direkta lösningar utifrån överenskommelse med kund.
   

  

 Det är även viktigt att du är flexibel och kan arbeta obekväma arbetstider då schemaläggning kommer förekomma måndag-söndag mellan 18-07 samt dagtid lördag och söndag.
   

  

 Vår verksamhet präglas av viljan att förstå våra kunders verksamhetsmässiga behov för att ta fram konkreta förslag på förbättringar som utvecklar kundens verksamhet så att de kan fokusera på det de är bäst på. Samarbete är en grundläggande förutsättning för oss och oberoende vart du befinner dig i organisationen är vi ett Nordlo där vi alltid strävar gemensamt mot våra mål. Genom kunskap, lyhördhet och förståelse är du med och bidrar till det våra kunder så högt värdesätter hos oss på Nordlo.
   

  

**Vem är du?**
 Vi ser gärna att du är
   

  

* En problemlösare med brinnande intresse och nyfikenhet för IT-säkerhetsområdet
* Ansvarstagande, analytisk, engagerad och lyhörd
* Obehindrad i att uttrycka dig på svenska i tal och skrift
* En prestigelös lagspelare som motiveras av att arbeta i team och lyckas med andra


 För att lyckas i den här rollen ser vi även att du uppfyller något av följande
   

  

* Relevant utbildning eller yrkeserfarenhet inom nätverk eller IT-säkerhet
* Kunskap och tidigare erfarenheter av Microsoft 365, SIEM-system, EDR-verktyg, sårbarhetshantering och härdning av operativsystem och ärendehanteringssystem
* Ett stort intresse för IT-säkerhet och en nyfikenhet som driver dig att vilja lära mer
* Tidigare erfarenhet som supporttekniker Tidigare erfarenhet inom skiftarbete


**Om oss**
 Vi är IT och digitaliseringspartnern som sätter medarbetare och kunder först. Vår framgång bygger på våra fantastiska medarbetares insatser, som med en passion för hållbara lösningar har kraft att förändra. Vi vet att goda idéer kan komma från organisationens alla hörn, och vi vill att våra medarbetare ska komma närmare känslan av att ingenting är omöjligt. Vi har valt en decentraliserad organisationsmodell med delegerat beslutsmandat, så att du kan driva din egen och kundens utveckling. Vår strävan och vilja är att ständigt förbättra, utmana och förändra. För att nå till toppen gör vi jobbet tillsammans, vi agerar med hjärtat och skapar affärsvärde för våra kunder.
   

  

**Om Nordlo**
 Vi är cirka 900 kollegor på 43 kontor i Sverige och Norge och levererar tjänster inom IT-infrastruktur till kunder inom både offentlig och privat sektor. Vi utvecklar våra kunder och stärker deras konkurrenskraft genom ett brett tjänsteerbjudande och skalbara lösningar. Vi finns till för att stärka våra kunder och effektivisera deras verksamhet.
   

  

 För att du ska trivas och må bra i vår organisation är ditt välmående viktigt för oss. Vi tror på en mångfald och arbetar aktivt för en jämlik och inkluderande företagskultur. Som anställd hos oss kan du förvänta dig följande:
   

  

 En god balans mellan arbetstid och fritid En stor delaktighet och möjlighet att påverka Ett nära samarbete mellan team och kollegor Ett lyhört och närvarande ledarskap
   

  

 Är det här rollen för dig? Tveka inte på att skicka in din ansökan redan idag. Ansökningar hanteras löpande och tjänsten kan komma att tillsättas innan sista ansökningsdag.
   

  

 Anställningsform: tillsvidareanställning | Anställningens omfattning: heltid | Antal lediga befattningar: 1 | Sysselsättningsgrad: 100% | Ort: Stockholm | Län: Stockholms län | Land: Sweden | Referensnummer: 2024/79 | Publicerat: 2024-06-24 | Sista ansökningsdag: 2024-09-01

title: Grocery Associate - Youth Workers
description:
**Job Description**
 Tycker du om att arbeta i en dynamisk arbetsmiljö, har ett kundorienterat tänk och älskar att arbeta med ett härligt team?
 **Är du 16 år eller äldre?** 
 Om ditt svar är ja - läs då vidare!
   

  

**Bakgrund**
 Wolt är ett finskt techbolag och vi är mest kända för vår matleverans-plattform. Matleveranser var bara början, och nu utforskar och utökar vi vår plattform med andra områden inom detaljhandel och dagligvaror. Vi har vuxit avsevärt under de senaste tre åren och utökat vår verksamhet från bara fyra länder i Norden till 25 länder i Europa och Asien idag. Och vi har bara börjat.
   

  

 Aktuell roll är en del av Wolt Market - våra alldeles egna livsmedelsbutiker som levererar bekvämlighet och en världsledande kundupplevelse. Wolt Market är vårt fantastiska koncept - människor i alla Wolt-länderna kan beställa sina matvaror och få dem levererade med ljusets hastighet! 🤩
   

  

 Vi söker efter både heltids- och deltidsanställda butiksmedarbetare för att bli en del av vårt fantastiska team i (stad) och du kan bli en del av vårt team så fort du fyller 16 år! I denna roll befinner du dig i hjärtat av vår dagliga butiksverksamhet, en sk Virtual Store - du kommer att se till att alla beställningar är plockade och redo att hämtas av våra kurirpartners eller kunder.
   

  

 Vår butik är öppen 7 dagar i veckan så denna roll kräver även att du kan arbeta på helger och i olika skift enligt Wolt Markets öppettider. Om du är en lagspelare, tycker om att arbeta självständigt och har ett gott sinne för humor, så är du kanske precis den person vi söker!
   

  

**Vad du ska göra**
* Ta emot beställningar via vår Merchant-app
* Plocka och packa matvaror och lämna dem till kunder och kurier.
* Hantera våra interna system som inkluderar exakt information om näringsämnen och allergener.
* Upprätthålla ordning och reda i butiken.
* Delta i att utveckla vår dagliga drift i butiken.


**Our humble expectations**
* Du är snabblärd och har förmågan att multitaska
* Proaktiv och serviceminded är ord som beskriver dig bra.
* Du har en kan-göra-attityd och tycker om idén att arbeta i en fartfylld entreprenörsmiljö.
* Du är tekniskt kunnig.
* Du kan arbeta både dagtid, sena kvällar och helger.
* Erfarenhet från tidigare arbete i livsmedelsbutik är meriterande!
* Du har mycket goda kunskaper i engelska, svenska är ett plus!
* Du har rätt att arbeta i Sverige.
* Du är 16 år eller äldre.


**Next Steps**
 Om du gillar att arbeta i en miljö med hög tillväxt där du kommer kunna ta ägarskap och vara en del av ett extremt ambitiöst team, klicka nedan för att ansöka!
   

  

 Att arbeta på Wolt Market är inte bara roligt, det är dessutom tryggt och säkert! Som anställd på Wolt Market omfattas du av Handels kollektivavtal för Lager och E-handel.
   

  

 Vi kommer att granska ansökningarna löpande, så vänta inte, skicka in din ansökan snarast! 🤩
   

  

**About Wolt**
 Wolt is a Helsinki-based technology company that provides an online platform for consumers, merchants and couriers. It connects people looking to order food and other goods with people interested in selling and delivering them. To enable this, Wolt develops a wide range of technologies from local logistics to retail software and financial solutions – as well as operating its own grocery stores under the Wolt Market brand. Wolt’s products include Wolt+ (subscription service for customers), Wolt for Work (meal benefits and office deliveries for companies), Wolt Drive (fast last-mile deliveries for merchants) and Wolt Self-Delivery (service for merchant partners with their own delivery staff). Wolt’s mission is to make cities better by empowering and growing local communities. Wolt was founded in 2014 and joined forces with DoorDash in 2022. DoorDash operates in 29 countries today, 25 of which are with the Wolt product and brand.
   

  

***So, why work at Wolt?***
**At Wolt, We’re About Getting Things Done.**
*You’ll probably enjoy it here if you like taking ownership, developing yourself and being around friendly, humble and ambitious people.*
*We work hard to make cities into better places, and it’s pretty cool seeing us grow every week. If you’re passionate about building things that just… work, Wolt might be for you.*
***Our Commitment to Diversity, Equity & Inclusion***
*We want to have all sorts of people in our team – people like you and me, and people different from you and me. To be able to work with diverse teammates – when it comes to gender, age, ethnicity, life background, sexual orientation, political views, religion, or any other personal trait – we consciously aim to offer equal opportunity for everyone to work with us. This is because we believe diverse teams make the most thought-through decisions and build things in the most inclusive way.*
*Join us today to build Wolt together.*

title: Företagssupport faktura till Telia
description:
*Har du känsla för service och vill bidra till nöjda kunder? Vill du ingå i ett härligt gäng och utvecklas i en kundnära och administrativ roll? Vi söker nu nya medarbetare till företagssupporten till Telia i Solna!*
**Om tjänsten**
 Det här är ett konsultuppdrag på 6 månader med goda möjligheter till förlängning. I den här rollen får du initialt en anställning hos Bravura. Detta ger både dig och Telia en bra möjlighet att lära känna varandra samt utvärdera hur ni trivs med ert samarbete.
   

  

  

  

**Om företaget**
 Telia Company är ett kommunikationsföretag inom IT- och telekom. De hjälper företag och privatpersoner att kommunicera på ett enkelt, effektivt och miljövänligt sätt. Sverige har en bredbandsinfrastruktur i världsklass med väl utbyggda fibernät och just nu moderniserar Telia hela mobilnätet med förstärkt 4G och 5G. Med cirka 21 000 medarbetare i sju länder, varav 4 700 kollegor i Sverige, erbjuder Telia den bästa uppkopplingen i de bästa näten och fortsätter att investera för ett mer digitalt och hållbart samhälle.
   

  

  

  

 Digitaliseringen har kopplat samman människor och låter oss prata, lyssna, titta, läsa och tycka, nästan var i världen vi än befinner oss. Nationer, företag och individer möts över gränser och kontinenter, dygnet runt och året om. Telia Company tillhandahåller grunderna i det digitala samhället som är avgörande för att skapa en bättre framtid.
   

  

  

  

 Välkommen till Telia, bättre nät, bättre upplevelser!
   

  

  

  

**Arbetsuppgifter**
 Som företagssupport inom faktura ansvarar du för den första kontakten med Telias företagskunder. Du tar emot inkommande samtal och supporterar kunder på telefon inom området fakturafrågor. Frågorna varierar i omfattning och komplexitet och du arbetar för att hitta bra lösningar som bidrar till nöjda kunder. Du erbjuds en gedigen introduktion och har kontinuerlig dialog med din närmaste chef för att utvecklas. Du tillhör en grupp med bred kompetens. Vissa av dina teamkollegor har samma roll som du och några av kollegorna sitter med angränsande arbetsuppgifter med djupare kunskap. Tillsammans arbetar ni för att hitta bra lösningar för att säkerställa nöjda kunder. Hos Telia finns det goda möjligheter och du uppmuntras till att utveckla din kompetens inom olika områden!
   

  

  

  

**Utbildning, erfarenhet och personliga egenskaper**
* Avslutad och godkänd gymnasieutbildning
* Minst 1 års arbetslivserfarenhet, gärna inom service
* Du talar och skriver obehindrat på svenska och du har goda kunskaper i engelska
* God datorvana


 Meriterande
   

  

  

  

* Arbetat med kundservice
* Arbetat med fakturarelaterade ärenden
* Arbetat mot uppsatta KPIer/måltal
* Eftergymnasial utbildning, med fördel inom ekonomi


 I rollen som företagsrådgivare är du serviceinriktad och drivs av att hjälpa kunder samt leverera lösningar. Då kunderna kan ha komplexa ärenden är det därför viktigt att du besitter en lösningsorienterad mentalitet där du inte drar dig för att nätverka bland kollegor för att hitta lösningen du söker. Du har förmåga att sätta kunden i fokus, vara uppmärksam och är tillmötesgående i ditt bemötande. Rollen kräver att du tar egna initiativ och trivs i en social roll med ett varierat arbetstempo, varpå du är flexibel i ditt arbetssätt.
   

  

  

  

**Övrig information**
 Start 2 september
   

  

  

  

 Plats Solna
   

  

  

  

 Lön Enligt överenskommelse
   

  

  

  

 Funderingar kring Bravuras rekryteringsprocess? Du finner svar på de vanligast förekommande frågorna här
   

  

  

  

 Är du nyfiken på hur vår rekryteringsprocess är upplagd? Du hittar mer information här
   

  

  

  

 Har du frågor om tjänsten eller kring din registrering är du välkommen att kontakta vår kandidatsupport via mail, info@bravura.se eller telefon 010-171 47 10 så hjälper vi dig. Ange vilken tjänst det gäller.
   

  

  

  

 Vi rekommenderar att du skickar in din ansökan omgående då vi gör ett löpande urval. Välkommen med din ansökan!

title: Driftchef
description:
*Var 660:e person som går till arbetet i Sverige är en ISS-medarbetare och det är vi stolta över. Vi är ett av Sveriges och Nordens största tjänsteföretag samt har över 450 000 medarbetare världen över. Det är våra medarbetare som är kärnan i vår verksamhet och förutsättningen för att kunna leva upp till vårt syfte, Connecting people and places to make the world work better. På ISS Facility Services skapar vi platser och miljöer som bidrar till bättre prestationer och en enklare, mer effektiv och trivsam tillvaro - levererade med omtanke och hög kvalitet av engagerade medarbetare. Vill du också bli en del i vår globala organisation där ditt jobb verkligen gör skillnad?*
**Driftchef till ISS Facility Services**
 ISS är på en förändringsresa mot vår vision att bli världens främsta serviceorganisation. Det är en ambitiös målsättning, satt av en målmedveten organisation. På ISS sätter vi service i första rummet och strävar ständigt efter att bli ännu bättre. Vi levererar ”service with a human touch” till kunden så att de kan fokusera på sin kärnverksamhet.
   

  

**Driftchef ISS Direct Stockholm**
 Till vår verksamhet inom vårt affärsområde ISS Direct söker vi en serviceinriktad, driven och engagerad driftchef som vill utveckla människor och affärer.
   

  

 Ansvarsområdet är en del av Stockholm som i dag är indelat i 10 olika geografiska driftområden med en driftchef i respektive område.
   

  

 Tjänsten är tillsvidare med tillträde enligt överenskommelse.
   

  

**Dina ansvarsområden:** 
 ISS erbjuder dig en plats i en organisation med tydliga värderingar, hög kvalitetsmedvetenhet och en stark vilja att lyckas med att utveckla medarbetare och chefer.
   

  

 Som Driftchef har du ekonomiskt ansvar samt kund- och personalansvar för ditt driftområde. Du förväntas kontinuerligt bevaka branschen och arbeta aktivt för att öka den organiska tillväxten genom merförsäljning och tjänsteutveckling. Driftchefen ansvarar vidare för kundrelationer och att arbetet bedrivs i enlighet med gällande avtal. I samarbete med kund strävar du efter ständiga förbättringar och utveckling av ISS leverans.
   

  

 För oss på ISS är ledarskap viktigt. Genom ditt goda ledarskap förväntas du skapa förutsättningar för dina medarbetare att kunna utvecklas och prestera. Som driftchef ansvarar du självklart för att verksamheten leds mot uppsatta mål i nära samarbete med kunder, medarbetare och närmaste chef. Du ansvarar även för att verksamheten är optimalt dimensionerad och bemannad.
   

  

 Att arbetet bedrivs i överensstämmelse med lagar och avtal samt ISS policys och värderingar är en självklarhet för dig i rollen som driftchef.
   

  

**Din profil:** 
 Vi söker dig som är en driven och kommunikativ ledare med förmåga att motivera din omgivning att nå resultat och uppsatta mål. Du behöver vara social och gilla att arbeta i grupp. För att lyckas i rollen förväntas du brinna för affärsutveckling och ha viljan och förmågan att skapa nya affärer. Du har även en förmåga att utveckla och effektivisera den befintliga verksamheten och värdesätter hög kvalitet och kundnöjdhet. Du är administrativ, gillar ordning och reda och har en passion för att ge service till kunder!
   

  

 Som driftchef på ISS förväntas du ha en utvecklad ledarförmåga som kännetecknas av kommunikation, stabilitet, resultatorientering och medarbetarutveckling. Därför är erfarenhet av ledarskap meriterande då arbetet innebär många personliga kontakter både inom och utanför organisationen krävs en god samarbetsförmåga samt ett intresse för människor. Du har vidare en god förmåga att skapa förtroende och utveckla långsiktiga relationer. Vi lägger stor vikt vid personlig lämplighet.
   

  

 Du har gymnasieutbildning och erfarenhet av ledarskap, ekonomi, personal, administration och kundrelationer. Du har troligtvis erfarenhet från liknande personalintensiv bransch. Du kommunicerar väl på svenska och har mycket goda IT-kunskaper. Körkort är ett krav då resor förekommer i tjänsten.
   

  

 Urval och intervjuer kommer att ske löpande.
   

  

**Din ansökan:**
 Hoppas att vi har fångat ditt intresse.
   

  

 Önskar du veta mer om tjänsten, kontakta Regionchef Per Holmberg. per.holmberg@se.issworld.com
   

  

***Observera!***
 Vi tar inte emot ansökningar via e-mail eller brev, enbart via registrering i vårt rekryteringssystem. Ansökningar via e-mail eller brev kommer att makuleras obehandlade.
   

  

 Välkommen med din ansökan!

title: Strategisk Projektledare till If
company: KiMM - en del av Wise Professionals
description:
Är du en skicklig strategisk projektledare? Har du erfarenhet som Managementkonsult? Vill du arbeta för ett etablerat starkt varumärke i ett företag där medarbetarna är vår viktigaste tillgång? Då kan det vara dig vi söker. Detta är en unik möjlighet att ansluta sig till oss som en nyckelspelare som formar vår framtid.
   

  

**Om rollen**
 Som strategisk projektledare arbetar du i en nordisk miljö med ett brett utbud av projekt. Huvuduppdraget är att inom affärsenheten Brand, Marketing & Communications, leda planering och aktivering av prioriterade nordiska strategiska projekt. Rollen kräver en förmåga att driva projekt med stark ledarskapsförmåga och affärsmannaskap där många intressenter är involverade från olika delar inom If.
   

  

 Exempel på projekt kan vara aktivering av kvalitativ analys, leda och koordinera arbete med årlig kundanalys, driva effektiviseringsprojekt eller projektleda och koordinera budskapsplattformar och ledarskapskommunikation. Rollen kommer att rapportera direkt till ledaren för affärskontroll och utveckling, ett nytt litet team som hanterar investeringar, affärsenhetens finansiella planeringsprocess samt driver projekt som stödjer affärsenhetens strategi. Din roll kommer att arbeta i nära samarbete med affärsenhetens ledningsteam.
   

  

**Som Strategisk Projektledare Kommer Du Att**
* Leda och aktivera prioriterade initiativ, både på enhets-, nordisk- och landsnivå
* Arbeta nära och ge råd till affärsenheten i strategisk utveckling och utvalda projekt
* Definiera målbild, strategiska utmaningar och rekommendationer
* Förbereda och presentera strategisk analys av utvalda affärsfrågor
* Stödja aktivitetsplanering i vår affärsenhet
* Driva verksamhetsförbättringsinitiativ
* Underlätta och aktivera nya affärsmöjligheter


 Teamet Business Control and Development ingår i den centrala nordiska affärsenheten Brand, Marketing & Communications bestående av 90 medarbetare inom flera verksamhetsområden från kreativa produktioner, marknadsföring, medarbetar- och företagskommunikation, media- och press, controlling och affärsutveckling. If kännetecknas av en informell men ambitiös arbetsmiljö, där personlig utveckling uppmuntras samtidigt som en god balans mellan arbete och privatliv upprätthålls. Vi strävar efter att vara det mest omtänksamma företaget. Du kommer till en energifylld arbetsplats med en varm och omtänksam kultur med kontoret placerat i fina lokaler i Bergshamra i Solna.
   

  

**Om dig**
 Du vill arbeta för ett etablerat starkt varumärke och har en passion för att utveckla, driva och implementera långsiktiga strategier inom en bredd av områden. Du är en person som förstår att ledning av process, projekt och kommunikation gör stor skillnad och trivs i en omväxlande vardag. Du är lösningsorienterad med ett genuint intresse för att driva komplexa uppgifter. Att säkerställa högkvalitativa resultat är viktigt för dig och du är van att prioritera ditt arbete efter värdeskapande. Som person är du prestigelös, organiserad och effektiv med en förmåga att få saker gjorda. Genom att vara en del av en stor organisation med flera intressenter förstår du också behovet av tvärfunktionellt samarbete samt har ett nordiskt förhållningssätt. Du har en genuin omtanke för dina kollegor och människor i din omgivning.
   

  

**Vi Ser Gärna Att Du Har**
* 4+ års erfarenhet från management consulting
* Förmåga att snabbt bedöma situationer och identifiera projektets behov och resurser
* Stark samarbets- och kommunikationsförmåga kring komplexa affärsfrågor
* Förmågan att bygga förtroende och samarbeta med seniora intressenter
* Förmåga att självständigt driva projekt med en stark känsla av ägarskap och prioritering
* Relevant akademisk utbildning
* Behärskar ett nordiskt språk flytande samt god kommunikationsförmåga på engelska


**Låter det intressant?**
 I den här rekryteringen samarbetar vi med KIMM / Wise Professionals. Vi ser fram emot din ansökan med CV och personligt brev på kimm.se. Vi tar tyvärr inte emot ansökningar via mejl pga GDPR. Om du går vidare i processen kommer du inom några dagar att få genomföra två arbetspsykologiska tester. Vi vill tidigt i processen samla in så mycket fakta som möjligt för att vi ska kunna göra den bästa matchningen. Som kandidat får du göra testerna tidigt i processen eftersom vi vill säkerställa ett objektivt, fördomsfritt och rättvist urvalsarbete.
   

  

**Mer information om rekryteringsprocessen
   

  

 Arbetsort** 
 : Bergshamra, Stockholm
   

  

**Startdatum** 
 : Enligt överenskommelse
   

  

**Sista ansökningsdag** 
 : 18 augusti. Urval och intervjuer kommer att ske löpande och tillsättning kan ske innan sista ansökningsdag så vänta inte med att skicka in din ansökan.
   

  

 Har du frågor om tjänsten vänligen kontakta ansvarig rekryteringskonsult Maggie Klingenstierna på maggie.klingenstierna@kimm.se.
   

  

 OBS! Processen kommer vara vilande p.g.a. semester under veckorna 27-30 men vi finns åter på plats v31.
   

  

 Varmt välkommen med din ansökan!
   

  

 \_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_
   

  

***We are If. Our purpose is to give people confidence today to shape their tomorrow.***
*To make this possible, trust is our backbone. We stay ahead and challenge ourselves to grow. And we always put our hearts into it – because it takes more than bright minds to make brilliant things happen.
   

  

 We are the leading insurance company in the Nordics/Baltics and a stable employer with 7,900 dedicated professionals. But most importantly, we are protectors of people, enablers of companies and encouragers of dreams. With our joint force of expertise and engagement we always stand by our customers’ side. Giving them the security and the confidence to be curious, explore new worlds, start new businesses and live their lives.
   

  

 We are an equal opportunity employer, convinced that a diverse and inclusive work culture boosts innovation and the growth of intellectual capital in many ways. It doesn’t matter who you are, where you come from, or what you look like. It is the different perspectives, backgrounds, and experiences each of us have and share, that will make a difference.
   

  

 Come and join us!*

title: Credit Project Manager, Group Credit Management
description:
**Job ID: 21469** 


  
 





 Would you like to be able to influence the future of credit processes and deliver customer value? We are now looking for a Project Manager to drive change in Group Credit Management, also the end-to-end credit processes, compliance and governance. Be part of the automation agenda, supported by a solid data foundation, deliver compliance in a way that adds customer/business value and efficiency.
 





  
 





**About this opportunity** 






  
 





 Our team adds value by organising, designing and leading business change in accordance with Business Strategy. Planning, executing, actively supervising, coaching and interacting with stakeholders to secure benefits to our customer and organisation. As Credit Project Manager, you will play a valuable role in maximising business benefits, this in a multi- national and cultural environment, were many opportunities can be harvested by having the customer in focus, supporting digitalisation, automation, value creation and benefit management, supported by your creativity, structure, drive and never give up mindset.
 





  
 





**What you will be doing** 
 :
 




* Defining governance in change, structuring roles, responsibilities and activities
* Defining benefits plans delivering continuous and incremental value to the organisation
* Driving business development and change e.g., through Business Architecture dialogues, Managing Programmes and Projects
* Executing change, creating transparency of status and predictable deliveries
* Involving the organisation through team work and collaboration
* Asking and giving feedback to continuously improve people, processes, tools and deliveries



  
 





 We are a small team driving change and nurturing change leadership, we expect you have a sharing and supporting mindset. We are looking to expand our team in the Nordics.
 





  
 





**Who you are** 






  
 





 Collaboration – Ownership – Passion – Courage. These are the values that guide us in being at our best, and that we expect that you share with us.
 





  
 





 We are looking for an senior change leader with a structured and analytical approach to management who excel in collaboration, planning and problem solving. You should be a reliable, result-driven, self-starter, who is well organised, have a knack for both being in the details (not getting stuck into those) and seeing the big picture. You are a born leader, well versed in Project/Programme management best practises and methods.
 





  
 





 You are a fast learner and a strong communicator. Ideally you like to work in a fast paced and dynamically changing environment, meeting tight deadlines. You are determined and never take "no" for an answer. You take pride in delivering in time and love challenges. You like to enthusiasm people, coach and support them. You can both cooperate in a pragmatic way and make demands. You are a team player supporting the team and your management is your leading star for success. You can deal with uncertainty in a fast changing environment, keeping your team focused and motivated.
 





  
 





 You are prepared to invest yourself in the role, to grow and give what it takes. We value your personality and that you have the right leadership approach and shares Nordea values. Working with data driven transparency and smarter instead of harder is critical for us to accelerate our journey towards automation. Therefore, you need to master our planning tools such as JIRA, MS project, Kendis and how to integrate with other tools that removes redundant work and internal red-taping. You need to have good understandings of our internal frameworks to guide our team to work in a relevant and efficient way. You have proven track record of independently and proactively tackling problems before they have become an issue, and collaborating as a team member make sure that things do not fall between chairs or behind the plan. You also need to fluently bridge the landscape between Business and IT, and to make thing happen practically on a daily basis.
 





  
 





**To succeed in this role, we believe that you** 
 :
 




* Are self-motivated, see opportunities
* Dare to take fast decision, even when not having all the facts
* Are structured, analytical and a natural leader
* Are up to date with leadership literature, project management methods and business architecture concept
* Don’t back for challenging dialogues
* See conflict as an opportunity for improved collaboration and communication



  
 





**Your experience and background** 
 :
 




* Banking & Insurance consulting experience at senior level from any of the “big fives”
* Experience running IT project and Data projects
* Programme/Project/Agile Management certification (IPMA A/B or PMP)
* Business Architecture know-how
* University degrees in Economy & Technical
* Credit risk management and Information Technology are also good merits
* Good communication skills and to be able to make presentations at C-level management
* Fluent English and at least one of the four main Nordic languages is expected



  
 





 If this sounds like you, get in touch!
 





  
 





**Next steps**




 Submit your application no later than
 



 30/06/2024
 



 . Please be aware that any applications coming through email will not be accepted. For more information, you’re welcome to contact Juan Cifuentes at Juan Cifuentes at juan.cifuentes@nordea.se.
 





  
 





**For candidates in Sweden only –** 
  For union information, please contact Finansförbundet at finansforbundet@nordea.se or SACO at SacoNordea@nordea.com.
 





  
 





 At Nordea, we know that an inclusive workplace is a sustainable workplace. We deeply believe that our diverse backgrounds, experiences, characteristics and traits make us better at serving customers and communities. So please come as you are.

title: Brand Manager Communication - Nicotine Pouches
description:
Be a part of a revolutionary change
   

  

 At PMI, we’ve chosen to do something incredible. We’re totally transforming our business and building our future on one clear purpose – to deliver a smoke-free future. Swedish Match is an affiliate of PMI and have been a leader in the industry for more than 200 years, and together we are working to deliver a smoke-free Nordic by 2035.
   

  

 We are now looking for a Brand Manager Communication for our Nicotine Pouches (NP) category who will effectively contribute to defining brand communication strategy for NP in the Nordic markets and drive relevant Brand Communication Plans and developments, which will enable us to fuel our journey towards a smoke-free future even faster.
   

  

 Role summary:
   

  

 In this role you will be deploying the NP brand communication campaigns and initiatives that enhance brand image and visibility, drive brand funnel and equity as well as category / portfolio targets. You will also act as Brand ambassador, upholding brand identity through consistent messaging and visual assets, embedding brand guidelines in all commercial programs, projects, and initiatives as well as ensuring relevancy to local market(s) and consumer context.
   

  

 Your “day to day”
   

  

  

* Conduct detailed market/category research and analysis to identify trends, consumer segments, needs and preferences, and competitive landscape to define business opportunities/business issues.
* Support Manager Brand Communication in development of the Nordic NP Brand Communication Strategy, ensuring the analysis of current situation and identify opportunities for growth. Coordinate, align, co-develop with relevant markets to secure integration in the market’s deployment strategies, following trade processes and market regulatory framework; subsequently prepare comprehensive brand communication plans to realize the strategy.
* Develop Annual Brand Plans and participate in the Long-Range-Plans development to address major business opportunities/issues identified through analysis and feed into the Original Budget / Long Range Plan.
* Drive development of the Nordic-specific communication toolboxes in cooperation with relevant stakeholders. Build and own the briefs towards Global NP brand team. Champion Nordic brand building efforts and ensure local relevancy by identifying current gaps, consumer needs and emerging trends, and collaborate with global cross-functional teams to secure brand initiatives and content that address consumer needs and drive competitive advantage.
* Develop, plan, and deliver high-quality integrated omnichannel communication campaign toolboxes for assigned projects and initiatives. Collaborate closely with channel owners to ensure relevancy and fit for the channel roles and objectives, driving brand and product performance across channels in respective markets.
* Lead and manage assigned initiatives and projects.


 Who you are
   

  

  

* Minimum 6+ years in Marketing, preferably in FMCG in an international environment.
* University degree in Marketing, business economics or similar field.
* Documented experience of having successfully worked with brand communication, advertising, or related roles, preferably within the FMCG industry.
* Very good strategic height and analytical ability but can work with details when required.
* Strong leadership skills with proven knowledge of effective informal leadership.
* Strong project management skills; structured and self-driven working style.
* Strong communication, presentation, and storytelling skills (incl. English).


 All applicants must have the legal right to work in Sweden.
   

  

 Please note that relocation support is not available for this job.
   

  

 What we offer
   

  

 Our success depends on the dedicated people who come to work every single day with a sense of purpose and an appetite for progress. Join PMI and you too can:
   

  

  

* Seize the freedom to define your future and ours. We’ll empower you to take risks, experiment and explore.
* Be part of an inclusive, diverse culture, where everyone’s contribution is respected; collaborate with some of the world’s best people and feel like you belong.
* Enjoy flexibility of hybrid way of working - split your time between working from our office or the comfort of your home, where it works best for you in line with business needs.
* Pursue your ambitions and develop your skills with a global business – our staggering size and scale provides endless opportunities to progress.
* Take pride in delivering our promise to society: to deliver a smoke-free future.

title: BATTERY PRODUCTION - Logistics Engineering Manager
description:
Scania is now undergoing a transformation from being a supplier of trucks, buses and engines to a supplier of complete and sustainable transport solutions.
   

  

 Dedicated to a Sustainable Future!
   

  

 The electrification trend in the automotive industry is moving fast. For P&L, this means that we need to prepare to increase the production of electric vehicles and help Scania become more sustainable. An important component of an electric vehicle is the battery.
   

  

 The first battery production in Sweden has just been inaugurated and we are currently starting the production of the first battery packs in our highly automated production. We are also the first Scania production unit to implement SAP.
   

  

 Battery production wants to be at the forefront of diversity and inclusion. In the logistics management team, we currently have several different nationalities and we are as many women as men.
   

  

 Logistics
   

  

 The logistics management team consists of a number of functions; production planning, material planning, material handling and logistics development.
   

  

 In logistics development, there are four departments with different focus areas;
   

  

  

* IT operations
* Logistics projects and PD
* Back office
* Front Office.


 We are now looking for both a manager for Back Office and a manager for Front Office.
   

  

 Head of Back and Defense Front Office
   

  

 Today, production and logistics are spread over three buildings and several different productions.
   

  

 We manufacture battery packs and modules in two different buildings. We manufacture cable harnesses in the third. Series and prototypes. Production consists of four workshop areas with about 8 group managers. In material handling , we have two business areas with about 7 group managers. All of these need support for their respective businesses. On the one hand, there is a need for logistics developers who handle the day-to-day issues that the business needs to deal with in order to deliver materials with 0 accidents and 0 errors. This is covered by the back Front Office team.
   

  

 But the business also needs to be ready for new part numbers, new capabilities, new requirements and planned improvements. Back Office focuses more on what lies further ahead than the daily business and creates working methods, methods, VSMs, layouts and trainings so that the material handling and Front Office can have good prerequisites to operate on a daily basis.
   

  

 Many processes in production and material handling are automatic, and the flows are strongly interconnected. Few things happen or move without signals in and between our IT systems.
   

  

 Your team has the expertise in flow dimensioning, layouts, automation, digitization, and good knowledge of system signals. You are a support for production and can, with the help of the operational functions, set off problems systematically with both short- and long-term solutions.
   

  

 How we want to be!
   

  

 Important to us is responsibility, coordination and collaboration with other colleagues in logistics but also in other functions. It is also important to be able to steer towards goals and deliveries through and with your group. We want to be able to learn from what can be improved and create methods and ways of working that support us going forward.
   

  

 You should have a bachelor's or master's degree and 2-5 years of experience in being a manager.
   

  

 We want you to be able to speak both Swedish and English.
   

  

 Application
   

  

 Your application must include CV, cover letter and relevant certificates and must be received no later than 2024-07-01. Screening and selection will be done continuously and the position may be filled before the application period ends.
   

  

 Scania is a world-leading provider of transport solutions. Together with our partners and customers we are driving the shift towards a sustainable transport system. In 2020, we delivered 66,900 trucks, 5,200 buses as well as 11,000 industrial and marine power systems to our customers. Net sales totalled to over SEK 125 billion, of which over 20 percent were services-related. Founded in 1891, Scania now operates in more than 100 countries and employs some 50,000 people. Research and development are mainly concentrated in Sweden. Production takes place in Europe and Latin America with regional product centres in Africa, Asia and Eurasia. Scania is part of TRATON GROUP. For more information visit: www.scania.com.

title: Senior Product Marketing Manager, Trilogy (Remote) - $400,000/year USD
description:
Crossover is the world's #1 source of full-time remote jobs. Our clients offer top-tier pay for top-tier talent. We're recruiting this role for our client, Trilogy. Have you got what it takes?
   

  

 The professional services industry is undergoing a rapid transformation, driven by the need for increased efficiency and innovation. Despite the proliferation of AI tools, many organizations still grapple with manual workflows, slow customer feedback loops, and the challenge of building a distinct market presence. Data shows that companies implementing AI-driven productivity improvements can see up to a 40% increase in efficiency, yet only a small fraction have successfully integrated these advancements into their operations.
   

  

 At Trilogy, we are reimagining the role of AI in professional services by focusing on generative AI to streamline processes and enhance customer engagement. This approach not only drives significant productivity gains but also ensures our solutions are at the forefront of technological innovation. Our commitment to leveraging the latest advancements in AI sets us apart and creates a dynamic, impactful work environment.
   

  

 This role is not your typical CEO track focused on developing pie-in-the-sky strategies or schmoozing investors. Instead, you will spearhead AI-driven productivity improvements, interact directly with customers to gather and implement feedback, and work towards automating an entire organization. This position is ideal for someone who thrives on using cutting-edge technology to drive business impact and excels in a fast-paced, customer-centric environment.
   

  

 As part of our team, you will have the unique opportunity to drive productivity and customer engagement across over 100 software products, all while bypassing the usual internal logistics of a traditional CEO role. If you are passionate about AI, eager to make a significant impact, and excited about building your brand, we encourage you to apply and join us on this transformative journey.
   

  

**What You Will Be Doing**
* Implementing AI-driven Productivity Improvements: Utilizing generative AI tools to streamline and automate various workflows across the organization.
* Customer Engagement and Feedback: Interacting with customers to gather insights and feedback, and using this information to enhance product offerings.
* Develop a Personal Monopoly: Publishing podcast episodes and blog posts and building a social media following to evangelize your portfolio's AI-driven products.


**Senior Product Marketing Manager Key Responsibilities**
* Transform a large professional services organization through the innovative use of generative AI


**Basic Requirements**
* At least 8 years of work experience in a professional services organization
* Experience using generative AI tools to achieve quantifiable productivity improvements
* Currently based in North America, South America, or Europe


**About Trilogy**
 Hundreds of software businesses run on the Trilogy Business Platform. For three decades, Trilogy has been known for 3 things: Relentlessly seeking top talent, Innovating new technology, and incubating new businesses. Our technological innovation is spearheaded by a passion for simple customer-facing designs. Our incubation of new businesses ranges from entirely new moon-shot ideas to rearchitecting existing projects for today's modern cloud-based stack. Trilogy is a place where you can be surrounded with great people, be proud of doing great work, and grow your career by leaps and bounds.
   

  

 There is so much to cover for this exciting role, and space here is limited. Hit the Apply button if you found this interesting and want to learn more. We look forward to meeting you!
   

  

**Working with Crossover**
 This is a full-time (40 hours per week), long-term position. The position is immediately available and requires entering into an independent contractor agreement with Crossover. The compensation level for this role is $200 USD/hour, which equates to $400,000 USD/year assuming 40 hours per week and 50 weeks per year. The payment period is weekly. Consult www.crossover.com/help-and-faqs for more details on this topic.
   

  

**What to expect next:**
* You will receive an email with a link to start your self-paced, online job application.
* Our hiring platform will guide you through a series of online “screening” assessments to check for basic job fit, job-related skills, and finally a few real-world job-specific assignments.


**Important!** 
 If you do not receive an email from us:
   

  

* First, emails may take up to 15 minutes to send, refresh and check again.
* Second, check your spam and junk folders for an email from Crossover.com, mark as “Not Spam” since you will receive other emails as well.
* Third, we will send to whatever email account you indicated on the Apply form - by default, that is the email address you use as your LinkedIn username and it might be different than the one you have already checked.
* If all else fails, just reset your password by visiting https://www.crossover.com/auth/password-recovery if you already applied using LinkedIn EasyApply.


 Crossover Job Code: LJ-5333-SE-Stockhol-SeniorProductM

title: Lead Risk Expert
description:
**Job ID: 24874** 






  

  



 At Nordea, we’re committed to being a partner our customers and society can count on. Compliance and integrity go hand in hand. Joining us means you’ll have an impact on how we do banking – today and tomorrow. So bring your ideas, skills and unique background. With us, you’ll be in good company with plenty of opportunities to collaborate, grow and make your mark on something bigger.
   

  





**About this opportunity** 


  
 





 Join our dynamic team at Nordea, one of the leading financial institutions in Europe. We are committed to maintaining the highest standards in risk management and regulatory compliance. As part of our continuous efforts to enhance our risk management capabilities, we are looking for a seasoned Lead Risk Expert to join our BCBS 239 Independent Validation Function.
 





  
 





 As a Lead Risk Expert within the BCBS 239 Independent Validation Function, you will play a crucial role in ensuring that our risk data aggregation and risk reporting practices meet the stringent requirements of BCBS 239. You will take a leading role in the independent validation efforts, assessing the effectiveness of our risk data aggregation processes, and ensuring the accuracy, integrity, and timeliness of risk reporting.
   

  


**What you’ll be doing:**




* Take a leading role in managing the independent validation of BCBS 239 compliance across the bank
* Evaluate the effectiveness of risk data aggregation and reporting processes
* Assess adherence to regulatory requirements and internal policies
* Develop and implement validation methodologies and frameworks
* Conduct a range of testing reviews, including quantitative and qualitative assessments of BCBS239 adherence
* Prepare comprehensive validation reports and present findings to senior management and relevant internal fora
* Collaborate with various departments, including Risk Management, IT and the business, to further develop the bank’s data governance and reporting practices
* Stay updated with regulatory changes and industry best practices related to BCBS 239




  
 


**Who you are**




 Collaboration. Ownership. Passion. Courage. These are the values that guide us in being at our best – and that we imagine you share with us.  
   

  

**To succeed in this role, we believe that you have:** 





* Excellent interpersonal and stakeholder management skills, being able to operate in cross-functional teams and manage multiple stakeholders
* Strong execution skills, being able to make the right priorities and deliver accurate, simple and effective solutions
* A structured mind-set, being able to see the big picture, as well as a strong attention to relevant details
* A flexible, open-minded and a strong cultural awareness
* Advanced analytical skills and attention to detail
* Excellent communication and presentation skills, including professional level spoken and written English



  

  


**Your experience and background:**




* Proven experience in independent validation work within a large European or international bank(s)
* In-depth understanding of BCBS 239 principles and requirements
* Strong background in risk management, data governance, and regulatory compliance
* Relevant academic qualifications, such as a degree in Finance, Economics, Business, or a related field



  

  



 If this sounds like you, get in touch!
 





  
 





**Next steps**




 Submit your application no later than
 



 01/07/2024
 



 . For more information, you’re welcome to contact Anders Dalgaard Petersen or Erik Wittrup.
   

  

 At Nordea, we know that an inclusive workplace is a sustainable workplace. We deeply believe that our diverse backgrounds, experiences, characteristics and traits make us better at serving customers and communities. So please come as you are.
 





  
 





 Please be aware that any applications or CVs coming through email or direct messages will not be accepted or considered.
 





  
 





**Only for candidates in Sweden:** 
 For union information, please contact finansforbundet@nordea.se or SACONordea@nordea.com.
 





  
 





**Only for candidates in Poland:** 
 Please include permit for processing personal data in CV as following: 
 





  
 





 In accordance with art. 6 (1) a and b. Regulation (EU) 2016/679 of the European Parliament and of the Council of 27 April 2016 on the protection of natural persons with regard to the processing of personal data and on the free movement of such data, and repealing Directive 95/46/EC (General Data Protection Regulation) hereinafter ‘GDPR’. I agree to have: my personal data, education and employment history proceeded for the purposes of current and future recruitment processes in Nordea Bank Abp. 
 





  
 





 The administrator of your personal data is: Nordea Bank Abp operating in Poland through its Branch, address: Aleja Edwarda Rydza Śmiglego 20, 93-281 Łodź. Your personal data will be processed for the recruitment processes in Nordea Bank Abp. You have a right to access your personal data, right to rectify and right to delete. Disclosing the personal data in the scope specified by the provisions of Polish Labour Code from 26 June 1974 and executive acts are mandatory. Providing personal data is necessary to conduct the recruitment processes. The request for the deletion of your personal data means resignation from further participation in recruitment processes and causes the immediate removal of your application. Detailed information concerning processing of your personal data can be found at: https://www.nordea.com/en/doc/nordea-privacy-policy-for-applicants.pdf.
 





  
 





 We reserve the right to reply only to selected applications.

title: Business Area Accounting Manager till Sandvik i Stockholm
description:
Are you already an Accounting Manager with experience from group accounting in a larger corporation? Or maybe a skilled auditor or controller with good knowledge in more complex accounting wanting to take the opportunity to be a leader in this exciting and truly global company? On behalf of Business Area Sandvik Mining and Rock Solutions (BA SMR), we are now recruiting a Business Area Accounting Manager who wants to take the lead in managing the closing process together with your team of two people. You will work with division controllers and stakeholders around the world and interact on a group level. You will be part of a global team of totally ten persons and you will report to the Director of Financial Control. BA SMR headquarter is located in the premises of World Trade Center in the center of Stockholm.
   

  

**Your Main Areas Of Responsibility As Accounting Manager**
* Coordinate monthly, quarterly and annual closing with more than 200 reporting entities worldwide
* Global process owner of Financial reporting
* Work extensively with IFRS principles and maintain and update BA SMR financial policies on intranet concerning IFRS and Sandvik principles and procedures
* Internal stock and inventory profit elimination
* Participate in integration of acquisitions, divestitures and mergers
* Participate in various projects undertaken by the business area
* Support and advise different stakeholders on qualified accounting and reporting matters
* Development and goal setting of two team members


**Qualifications And Experience**
 You have a recognized university degree or similar in a relevant field and have at least 5-6 years of relevant work experience. You might have previous experience from auditing, controlling or as an accounting manager. You are knowledgeable in IFRS and have a good understanding of group accounting either from a larger company or from an organization with a certain complexity. It is advantageous if you have experience in mergers and acquisitions. To be successful, you need to have worked with or be familiar with one of the major consolidation systems and a larger business system. Good knowledge of Excel as well as strong skills in PowerBI is needed for this role. Very good command of English in speech and writing is a requirement, Swedish is advantageous.
   

  

**Personal characteristics** 
 You are communicative with pedagogical skills, which makes it easy for you to enthuse and gain support from others. You are analytical, positive and skilled in spotting opportunities and solutions. You collaborate well with people in your environment while also possessing a strong sense of self-leadership, high motivation and a clear initiative. Taking responsibility, ensuring quality, and completing tasks comes natural to you.
   

  

**What does the company offer you?** 
 At Sandvik, we’re tech driven, innovative and entrepreneurial. We believe that success is a team effort so we value diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive culture where people can be themselves and reach their full potential. So, we invest in supporting each other, learning together and celebrating our differences. Visit our
   

  

**Location:** 
**Stockholm center**
**Some Words About Your Workplace** 
 We’re a leading supplier of equipment and tools, service and technical solutions for mining and rock excavation with an ambition to grow and continuously add value across all our businesses – utilizing our global footprint and customer focus. We work in an environment of inclusive collaboration, agility, and innovation where we nurture a growing portfolio of products and solutions based on the needs of the market, and where pioneering software technology meets the core of manufacturing. And last but not least, we’re proud to offer you a workplace where team spirit and work life balance really matter!
   

  

**Application**
 In this recruitment process, Sandvik collaborates with Meritmind. For more information, please contact the responsible recruitment consultant at Meritmind,
 **Ulrika Wallerman 070-166 08 60 or Marie Edström-Barter 070-509 94 14** 
 . Interviews and selection will take place continuously, so please send your application as soon as possible. You can apply for this position if the ad is available on our website.
   

  

 Meritmind works based on competence to promote objective and non-discriminatory recruitment. This means i.e. that you will be allowed to take occupational psychology tests if you proceed to an interview in this process. In most appointments, a background check is also carried out.
   

  

**Consider this before submitting your application (in accordance with the GDPR legislation)**
* Your application must not contain personal data regarding marital status, family situation/children, ethnic origin, age, political opinions, religious or philosophical beliefs, trade union membership, health, or sexual orientation.
* Make sure your name and contact details are included in your CV.
* It is enough to attach your CV.


**Godkänn datalagring**
 För att kunna registrera din ansökan behöver vi ett godkännande att spara dina personuppgifter. Läs mer på vår
   

  

**Ansök till denna tjänst**
 Ansök med
   

  

 För att vi ska kunna genomföra en så objektiv rekryteringsprocess som möjligt ber vi dig utesluta känsliga personuppgifter så som ålder, civilstatus, familjesituation/barn, etniskt ursprung, politiska åsikter, religiös eller filosofisk övertygelse, medlemskap i fackförening, hälsa eller sexuell läggning.

title: SAP S/4 HANA Sales Consultant
description:
Are you passionate about transforming businesses with cutting-edge technology and steering them towards data-driven success? If merging your business consulting expertise with strategic technological insights excites you, then our S/4 HANA Sales Consultant role in our SAP Business Group is the perfect match for you!
   

  

 Join Accenture and contribute your talent and passion to a team dedicated to leveraging technology and human ingenuity. This opportunity allows you to develop your skills and carve out an exceptional career path. You'll play a crucial role in transforming organizations and communities worldwide. It's time to embrace change!
   

  

**About Our Nordic SAP Business Group**
 Accenture’s collaboration with SAP extends over 40 years, establishing us as the leading SAP transformation partner in the Nordic region. We engage comprehensively with SAP, from product innovation to development and delivery, driving the future of business through significant SAP transformation programs for top-tier companies.
   

  

 In our Nordic SAP community, we focus on the latest solutions like SAP S/4 HANA Cloud, Ariba, SuccessFactors, SAP BTP, and SAP RISE. We're currently expanding our team and are seeking professionals across various roles and experience levels.
   

  

 Discover more about our SAP Practice at Accenture SAP Services.
   

  

**What’s in It for You:**
- Engage in major global implementation projects with leading SAP clients.

- Play a key role in innovative SAP transformation projects.

- Access significant professional growth and career advancement opportunities.

- Develop your business acumen, consulting capabilities, and technical skills.

- Utilize our global network’s comprehensive tools and resources, including implementation methodologies, knowledge databases, industry-leading software, and expert insights.

- Receive ongoing guidance and feedback from a dedicated mentor.

- Immerse yourself in our dynamic work environment, rich with culture and core values.

- Apply your expertise in S/4 HANA Sales to analyze, design, and implement business processes using SAP best practices.

- Deliver client value with your industry knowledge in SAP solutions.

- Collaborate and deliver within our diverse and engaged global network.

- Enjoy competitive compensation and benefits.

- Support clients' sustainability goals through SAP transformations.

**SAP Customer & Channels Nordic Value Tower**
 As a pivotal part of our technology practice, the Customer & Channels group specializes in implementing, customizing, and optimizing SAP S/4 HANA Sales solutions to meet the evolving needs of our business and our clients.
   

  

 We are seeking passionate, innovative professionals to join us.
   

  

 Ideal candidates will have a strong background in SAP S/4 HANA, particularly in sales, a commitment to excellence, and a drive to continuously learn and adapt in a fast-paced environment.
   

  

**Who We’re Looking For:**
- At least 2 years of hands-on SAP experience, preferably in the Nordic region.

- Expertise in S/4 HANA Sales or Sales and Distribution.

- Good understanding of the Quote/Order to cash process.

- Experience in at least one S/4HANA project end-to-end .

- Experience with latest methodologies within SAP S/4 HANA e.g., Fiori, BRF+, RISE, SAP BTP.

- A passion for SAP and delivering the latest technologies to clients.

- Strong analytical skills, result-oriented mindset, and a responsible approach.

- Excellent communication and presentation skills in English.

- A bachelor’s or master’s degree.

**Preferred Qualifications:**
- Experience in other SAP modules MM, CAR, EWM.

- Proficiency in a Nordic language.

- Experience leading a team.

- SAP certification in a relevant area.

- In-depth industry experience in one or more sectors.

**What We Offer**
 We have fun at work, and we focus on good work-life balance. We work across Nordics, and we support and root for one another. We cherish a psychologically safe environment where everyone´s allowed to be their true selves.
   

  

  

- Truly competitive salary terms, bonus program, (pension), health insurance, (employee stock purchase program) and fringe benefits

- Work-life balance: good arrangements to combine free time and family life with work. We offer active support for mental health.

- Personal Mentor to guide your career within Accenture´s global possibilities

- Market-leading expertise and great learning opportunities

**Location:** 
 Stockholm, Gothenburg, Malmö
   

  

**Does this appeal to you?** 
  

  

 If so, we really wish to hear from you! (We need people who can challenge conventional wisdom, offer unique perspectives, and contribute with innovative solutions.)
   

  

*If you are interested to learn more about Accenture´s recruitment process, great! We have gathered more info for you* 
 here.

title: Procurement Category Manager
description:
**ValueOne is looking for a Procurement Category Manager with experience from strategic sourcing and category management for a consultant assignment at a company in Solna, north of Stockholm. The assignment starts in early August and lasts for six months with possibilities for extension.** 




  





*ValueOne are specialists in supply chain management, purchasing, and logistics. We offer our customers services in three business areas: interim logistics and procurement consultants, recruitment of buyers and logisticians, as well as the development of our customers’ supply chain operations in terms of strategies, models, methods, processes, structure, and competence.* 




*We can offer a variety of assignments at all levels within Supply Chain Management. As a consultant at ValueOne, you are part of a professional and enterprising team consisting of the leading consultants in purchasing and logistics. If you choose to join our team, you are offered:* 



* *A market salary, which you can influence yourself.*
* *Occupational pension.*
* *Health and care insurance.*
* *Health care allowance.*
* *Personal coaching and career advice.*
* *Network meetings with competent colleagues and Supply Chain professionals through recurring events and lectures.*
* *Competence development through world-leading individually tailored education and courses in Supply Chain thanks to our partnership with CIPS (www.cips.org).*



  





**The role** 




 We are currently seeking a Procurement Category Manager who will be responsible for developing and executing the procurement and category strategy for critical categories. This role will also be responsible for executing direct and indirect purchasing activities, either independently or by leading a team of buyers, and negotiating contracts with suppliers within the commodity area.
 



  





 Main tasks:
 


* Accountable for creating and implementing the Category Strategy. Set long-term development goals, follow up, and report progress.
* Lead and drive procurement projects (RFI/RFP/RFQ).
* Lead supplier evaluation, selection, and phase-in/phase-out processes.
* Monitor supplier capacity and delivery performance.
* Manage direct and indirect procurement activities, aiming to reduce total costs and ensure supply continuity.
* Maintain pricing and standard costing for products in the category.
* Monitor and forecast internal demand and external market trends.
* Manage supplier accounts, including contracts, key negotiations, performance management, and escalation handling.
* Develop professional relationships with key suppliers through executive meetings and defined business metrics.
* Direct new supplier introduction and/or disengagement requirements.



  





**Experience and Competencies** 




 To be relevant for the assignment as Procurement Category Manager you need to have a bachelor’s degree or equivalent education in sourcing and supply chain. The role also requires at least five years of experience in a similar role within strategic sourcing and category management. Fluency in English, both verbal and written, is essential. Swedish is meritorious. We prefer you to have experience in the medical device, pharmaceutical, or diagnostics industry as well as knowledge in OEM chemicals and reagents (or packaging and plastics).
 



  





 You are an expert in sourcing and supply chain management with excellent tendering and negotiation skills. You have experience in leading cross-functional teams and is proficient in communicating complex concepts and negotiating different viewpoints. Also, knowledge of contractual terms and conditions in Europe is beneficial as well as ability to read and interpret product BOMs.
 



  





 Good IT skills is an asset, especially proficiency in MS Excel, MS PowerPoint and SAP. As a person you are a self-starter with critical thinking skills and problem-solving abilities under pressure. We also place great value on strong stakeholder management skills.
 



  





**Application** 




 We look forward to receiving your application. Feel free to contact Lotta Muth at +46 73 388 66 07 or 010 332 29 20 with any questions regarding the listed position. Please note that to apply for this position you need to be an EU citizen or have a valid Swedish working permit.

title: Senior Project Leader driving Business Change - Group Financial Crime Prevention
description:
**Job ID: 24588** 






  
 





**Senior Project Leader driving Business Change - Group Financial Crime Prevention** 






  
 





 Do you want to work on strategically important topics contributing to the fight against financial crime? We are looking for a Senior Project Leader to drive complex business change projects, and develop an E2E project portfolio management capability, within the Know Your Customer (KYC) area of financial crime prevention.
 







  
 







 At Nordea, we’re committed to being a partner that our customers and society can rely on. Joining us means you’ll have a direct impact on how Nordea drives it strategy. So bring your ideas, skills and unique background. With us, you’ll be in good company with plenty of opportunities to collaborate, grow and make your mark on something bigger.
 





  
 





**About this opportunity** 






  
 





 Welcome to KYC Portfolio Management, a team within the KYC unit of Group Financial Crime Prevention (GFCP). We add value by leading business change projects across the KYC value chain in Nordea, and by delivering best practice in the oversight and administration of the KYC business change portfolio.
 





  
 





 As a Senior Project Leader, you will lead a wide range of high-profile change initiatives spanning multiple areas of the KYC organization, as well as play a vital role in developing the KYC portfolio management capability. It is therefore important that you have the skills to deliver impactful results through your personal leadership and subject matter expertise, while collaborating across multiple functions, agendas and management levels.
 





  
 





 This is an opportunity for you to be part of an important area for Nordea and society in general where you will be working with highly competent people in an energetic and dynamic environment. You will be collaborating with stakeholders from all over Nordea located in the Nordics, the UK, Poland and Estonia. 
 



 This role can be based in Sweden, Finland, Poland or Estonia.
 





  
 





**What you will be doing:** 





* Taking overall project ownership ensuring project plans are executed from initiation to closing
* Be responsible for project scope refinement to ensure benefit realisation takes place
* Overseeing project deliveries following the appropriate project model and framework
* Identifying and conducting analyses across the organisation and bringing expertise in strategic thinking, business case analysis and business insight
* Shaping and delivering regulatory and efficiency initiatives across the Nordic countries
* Interacting with senior business stakeholders to ensure effective and timely deliveries aligned with business expectations
* Contributing to the development, continuous improvement and administration of an E2E KYC project portfolio, encompassing intake, analysis, prioritization, management, reporting and benefit tracking



  
 





**Who you are** 






  
 





 Collaboration. Ownership. Passion. Courage. These are the values that guide us in being at our best and that we imagine you share with us.
 





  
 





**To succeed in this role, we believe that you:** 





* Are an experienced professional within the financial crime prevention area
* Have a track record of managing complex projects focusing on business processes
* Are solution oriented, quality focused and structured
* Are adept at managing stakeholders, including senior business leaders
* Have very strong writing and presentation skills
* Are fluent in spoken and written English



  
 





**Your experience and background:** 





* 5+ years’ experience as a senior project manager in financial crime prevention or equivalent risk taxonomy
* Experience in developing, maintaining and running a project portfolio management capability
* Relevant qualifications in relation to Financial Crime Prevention (e.g. ACAMS or ICA certification) and/or project management (e.g. PRINCE2, Agile) will be considered an advantage



  
 





 If this sounds like you, get in touch!
 





  
 





**Next steps**




 Submit your application no later than
 



 31/07/2024
 



 . For more information, you’re welcome to contact James Rose (james.rose@nordea.com). Interviews will be conducted on a continuous basis.
   

  

 At Nordea, we know that an inclusive workplace is a sustainable workplace. We deeply believe that our diverse backgrounds, experiences, characteristics and traits make us better at serving customers and communities. So please come as you are.
 





  
 





 Please be aware that any applications or CVs coming through email or direct messages will not be accepted or considered.
 





  
 





**Only for candidates in Sweden:** 
  For union information, please contact finansforbundet@nordea.se or SACONordea@nordea.com.
 





  
 





**Only for candidates in Poland:** 
 Please include permit for processing personal data in CV as following:
 





  
 





 In accordance with art. 6 (1) a and b. Regulation (EU) 2016/679 of the European Parliament and of the Council of 27 April 2016 on the protection of natural persons with regard to the processing of personal data and on the free movement of such data, and repealing Directive 95/46/EC (General Data Protection Regulation) hereinafter ‘GDPR’. I agree to have: my personal data, education and employment history proceeded for the purposes of current and future recruitment processes in Nordea Bank Abp.
 





  
 





 The administrator of your personal data is: Nordea Bank Abp operating in Poland through its Branch, address: Aleja Edwarda Rydza Śmiglego 20, 93-281 Łodź. Your personal data will be processed for the recruitment processes in Nordea Bank Abp. You have a right to access your personal data, right to rectify and right to delete. Disclosing the personal data in the scope specified by the provisions of Polish Labour Code from 26 June 1974 and executive acts are mandatory. Providing personal data is necessary to conduct the recruitment processes. The request for the deletion of your personal data means resignation from further participation in recruitment processes and causes the immediate removal of your application. Detailed information concerning processing of your personal data can be found at: https://www.nordea.com/en/doc/nordea-privacy-policy-for-applicants.pdf
 





  
 





 We reserve the right to reply only to selected applications.

title: Senior Manager, China Outbound Supply (Bangkok-based, Relocation Provided)
description:
**About Agoda**
 Agoda is an online travel booking platform for accommodations, flights, and more. We build and deploy cutting-edge technology that connects travelers with more than 3.6 million accommodations globally. Based in Asia and part of Booking Holdings, our 6,000+ employees representing 90+ nationalities foster a work environment rich in diversity, creativity, and collaboration. We innovate through a culture of experimentation and ownership, enhancing the ability for our customers to experience the world.
   

  

**Our Purpose –** 
**Bridging the World Through Travel**
 We believe travel allows people to enjoy, learn and experience more of the amazing world we live in. It brings individuals and cultures closer together, fostering empathy, understanding and happiness.
   

  

 We are a skillful, driven and diverse team from across the globe, united by a passion to make an impact. Harnessing our innovative technologies and strong partnerships, we aim to make travel easy and rewarding for everyone.
   

  

**THIS ROLE IS BASED IN BANGKOK, THAILAND (RELOCATION PROVIDED)**
**Location of this job: Bangkok, Thailand (Not open for Remote Working)**
**Get to Know Our Team:**
 Agoda is seeking a dynamic and visionary Senior Manager to spearhead our efforts in capturing the China Outbound tourist segment across Asia. As the Senior Manager for this crucial market, you will play a pivotal role in Agoda’s growth by ensuring optimal room availability, competitive pricing, and a comprehensive go-to-market (GTM) strategy tailored specifically for Chinese tourists.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities:**
* Project Management: Lead and manage multiple projects simultaneously, ensuring they are delivered on time.
* Strategic Planning: Develop and implement project management strategies that align with the B2B team’s goals and objectives.
* Stakeholder Management: Collaborate with internal and external stakeholders to ensure project alignment and successful execution.
* Performance Tracking: Monitor project performance using appropriate tools and techniques, and report progress to senior management.
* Process Improvement: Continuously evaluate and improve project management processes to enhance efficiency and effectiveness.
* Management Presentation: Prepare presentations for senior management on performance updates and deep-dive analyses on key drivers.


**What You’ll Need to Succeed:**
* Minimum 6+ years of experience in top-tier consulting firms, international tech companies, or fast-growing internet/tech startups.
* Bachelor’s Degree or higher from a top university in a quantitative field, finance, or engineering. Advanced business degrees are preferred.
* An MBA from a top school is preferred.
* Detail-oriented and results-driven.
* Strong leadership and decision-making capabilities.
* Analytical mindset with strong problem-solving skills.
* Ability to communicate fluently in English.
* Proficiency in SQL, Tableau, advanced Excel skills, and advanced PowerPoint and presentation skills.
* Proven track record in consulting projects, project management, business planning, or business/financial analysis.
* Proven track record in using data analysis, data insights, and experimentation to support business decisions.
* Intellectual curiosity, ability to learn fast, and data driven
* A team player who works well with multiple stakeholders in a multicultural environment
